sentences.en: A new, more pliant prime minister took over.
sentences.cn: 新上任的首相也更加顺从。

sentences.en: As pliant as silicon has been over the last half - century, carbon nanotubes have some significant advantages.
sentences.cn: 尽管硅在过去 半 个世纪里用途广泛, 但碳纳米管拥有某些明显优势.

sentences.en: Isabel was pliant in his arms.
sentences.cn: 伊莎贝尔温顺地依偎在他怀中。

sentences.en: New research shows how the pliant animals create such a stiff limb.
sentences.cn: 现在,研究显示了这种软梯动物时如何形成这样有力的肢体.

sentences.en: Only flow .... The power is IN the flow, and each drop of water is pliant and soft.
sentences.cn: 只是流动……力量就在流动中，每一滴水都是顺从的，柔软的。

sentences.en: Our factory's spring chairs are Both pliant and strong, and comfortaBle to sit in.
sentences.cn: 本厂弹簧椅,韧硬兼顾, 坐感舒服.

sentences.en: She lay pliant in his arms.
sentences.cn: 她顺从地偎依在他的怀中。

sentences.en: She's proud and stubborn, you know, under that pliant exterior.
sentences.cn: 你要知道，在温顺的外表下，她既自傲又固执。

sentences.en: Then he put a forkful into his mouth, chewing with discernment the toothsome pliant meat.
sentences.cn: 然后往嘴里塞了一叉子, 边咀嚼边细细品尝着那美味可口的嫩腰子.

sentences.en: They weave a basket out of osiers with pliant young willows.
sentences.cn: 他们用易弯的柳枝编制篮子。

sentences.en: When it is dragged over pliant areas, an percussive tap could indicate this collision.
sentences.cn: 我们在这里使用“受范”一词来表达物体和屏幕区域是可以被使用者操作的.

words.tran_cn: 顺从的；[木]易弯的；易受影响的；能适应的

trans.tran_cn: 易弯的，柔韧的，能适应的
trans.tran_en: A pliant person can be easily influenced and controlled by other people
